sources.title: Anatomy Of A Psycho
sources.description: Chet Marco, after the execution of his brother for murder, becomes obsessed with getting revenge against those responsible for the verdict. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

sources.title: Anatomy Of A Psycho
sources.description: The crazed brother of a condemned killer sent to the gas chamber swears vengeance on those he holds responsible for his brother's execution. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/anatomy-of-a-psycho-1961/

sources.title: Anatomy Of A Psycho 1961 Trim
sources.description: The brother of a man sent to the gas chamber plots to destroy everyone connected to his sibling's conviction.

sources.title: Anatomy of a Psycho (1961) GRINDHOUSE
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Darrell Howe, Pamela Lincoln, Ronnie Burns
Writers: Jane Mann, Don Devlin, Edward D. Wood Jr.(?)
Director: Boris Petroff

A terrifying journey into the mind of a psychotic killer! A young man prowls the night seeking revenge against all those responsible for sending his brother to the gas chamber. Co-star Ronnie Burns is the adopted son of George and Gracie.

TRIVIA: Did Ed Wood have a hand in writing this Teensploitation Trash-da-piece? Leave your thoughts in the comment section and perhaps we will solve this 60-year-old Ed Woodian mystery.

sources.title: Anatomy of a Psycho
sources.description: Driven to the edge of insanity by the execution of his older brother, Chet (Darrell Howe) is boiling over with hatred. After getting his face slashed in a senseless alley-way brawl, his paranoia begins to paint everyone around him as an enemy. He turns to his sweet younger sister, his slutty girlfriend, and even his old poker buddies for solace, but all of them have real or imagined links back to the ill-fated trial that condemned his brother, thus aggravating Chet's psychosis. After viciously assaulting the prosecuting attorney's son, the troubled youth draws the relentless attention of detective Lt. Mac (Michael Granger). Spiraling out of control, Chet commits an arson and then a senseless murder. With Lt. Mac ratcheting up the pressure, Chet sinks deeper and deeper into the bottomless pit of his own psychotic delusions

sources.title: Anatomy of a Psycho (1961) Crime, Drama, Thriller, Psychotronic | Full Movie Subtitled
sources.description:
A Psychotic Killer prowls the night! ... Will he be stopped before he kills again?
The crazed brother of a condemned killer sent to the gas chamber swears vengeance on those he holds responsible for his brother's execution.

Director: Boris Petroff 
Writer: Jane Mann,
Stars: Ronnie Burns, Pamela Lincoln, Darrell Howe 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Crime, Drama, Thriller
